refnamediv.refpurpose: Initiates MicroDAQ analog inputs (AO) in scanning mode

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: mdaq_ai_scan_init(link_id, channels, range, differential, frequency, time); mdaq_ai_scan_init(channels, range, differential, frequency, time);

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function initaties analog inputs (AO) in scanning mode.
HARDWARE LIMITATIONS: On MicroDAQ version with ADC01/DAC01 there is no possibility to use AI and AO scan functions simultaneously.

listitem.para: channels: Single channel or array of channels to use
range: Analog input range, integer number according to MDAQ device version - check usage description.
duration: Analog input scan duration [sec], (-1) - infinite duration

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: This example acquire data from analog input channels 1-8, sample rate 10 kHz, duration 1 sec. Functions are called without link_id.
